abstract: The chief executive officers of JPMorgan Chase, Goldman Sachs Group, and Morgan Stanley will headline the inaugural hearing of a congressional panel investigating Wall Street’s financial crisis.
snippet: The chief executive officers of JPMorgan Chase, Goldman Sachs Group, and Morgan Stanley will headline the inaugural hearing of a congressional panel investigating Wall Street’s financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The chief executives of JPMorgan Chase, Goldman Sachs Group, and Morgan Stanley will headline the inaugural hearing of a congressional panel investigating Wall Street’s financial crisis, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Bank Chiefs to Testify Before Panel on Crisis
